getLatestBin: SELECT * FROM `sandbox` WHERE `url`=? ORDER BY `revision` DESC LIMIT 1
setBinPanel: UPDATE `sandbox` SET `:panel`=?, `created`=DATETIME('NOW') WHERE `url`=? AND `revision`=? AND `streaming_key`=? and `streaming_key`!=''
setUser: INSERT INTO `ownership` (`name`, `key`, `email`, `last_login`, `created`, `updated`) VALUES (?, ?, ?, DATETIME('NOW'), DATETIME('NOW'), DATETIME('NOW'))
getBinsByUser: SELECT `url`, `revision` FROM `owners` WHERE `name`=? ORDER BY `url`, `revision` DESC
getLatestBinForUser: SELECT `url`, `revision` FROM `owners` WHERE `name`=? ORDER BY `id` DESC LIMIT 1
getUserForForgotToken: SELECT `ownership`.*, expires FROM `ownership` INNER JOIN `forgot_tokens` ON `name` = `owner_name` WHERE `token` = ? AND `forgot_tokens`.`expires` >= DATETIME('NOW')
deleteExpiredForgotToken: DELETE FROM `forgot_tokens` WHERE `expires` <= DATETIME('NOW') OR `token`=? OR `owner_name`=?
